what: Construct Process Maps Using Event Data
title: Construct Process Maps Using Event Data
text: processmapR R package creating process maps. Part bupaR eco-system business process analysis.

title: Construct Process Maps Using Event Data
text: can install processmapR CRAN :
code: install.packages("processmapR")

title: Construct Process Maps Using Event Data
text: can install development version processmapR GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("bupaverse/processmapR")

title: Construct Process Maps Using Event Data
text: bupaR Documentation website contains details creating process maps using processmapR. process map
code: library(processmapR) #>  #> Attaching package: 'processmapR' #> The following object is masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     frequency library(bupaR) #>  #> Attaching package: 'bupaR' #> The following object is masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter #> The following object is masked from 'package:utils': #>  #>     timestamp  # Process map patients %>%   process_map() #> PhantomJS not found. You can install it with webshot::install_phantomjs(). If it is installed, please make sure the phantomjs executable can be found via the PATH variable. # Dotted chart patients %>%   dotted_chart(x = "absolute", sort = "start")

title: Custom map profile — custom
text: Function create custom map profile based event log attribute.

title: Custom map profile — custom
code: custom(   FUN = mean,   attribute,   units = "",   color_scale = "PuBu",   color_edges = "dodgerblue4" )

title: Custom map profile — custom
text: FUN summary function called provided event attribute, e.g. mean, median, min, max. na.rm = T default. attribute name case attribute visualize (numeric) units Character placed values (e.g. EUR monitary euro values) color_scale Name color scale used nodes. Defaults PuBu. See Rcolorbrewer::brewer.pal.info() options. color_edges color used edges. Defaults dodgerblue4.

title: Custom map profile — custom
text: used edges, show attribute values related -going node edge.#'

title: Custom map profile — custom
code: if (FALSE) { library(eventdataR) library(processmapR) data(traffic_fines) # make sure the amount attribute is propagated forward in each trace # using zoo::na.locf instead of tidyr::fill since it is much faster # still the whole pre-processing is still very slow library(zoo)  traffic_fines_prepared <- traffic_fines %>% filter_trace_frequency(percentage = 0.8) %>% group_by_case() %>% mutate(amount = na.locf(amount, na.rm = F)) %>% ungroup_eventlog()  process_map(traffic_fines_prepared, type_nodes = custom(attribute = "amount", units = "EUR")) }

title: Deprecated Functions — deprecated
text: plotly_dotted_chart() deprecated favour plotly_dotted_chart(..., plotly = TRUE). plotly_lined_chart() deprecated favour plotly_lined_chart(..., plotly = TRUE). plotly_trace_explorer() deprecated favour plotly_trace_explorer(..., plotly = TRUE).

title: Deprecated Functions — deprecated
code: idotted_chart(eventlog, plotly = FALSE)  iplotly_dotted_chart(eventlog)  plotly_dotted_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative", "relative_week", "relative_day"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   add_end_events = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )  ilined_chart(eventlog, plotly = FALSE)  iplotly_lined_chart(eventlog)  plotly_lined_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   line_width = 2,   plotly = TRUE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )  plotly_trace_explorer(   log,   coverage = NULL,   n_traces = NULL,   type = c("frequent", "infrequent"),   coverage_labels = c("relative", "absolute", "cumulative"),   abbreviate = TRUE,   show_labels = TRUE,   label_size = 3,   scale_fill = bupaR::scale_fill_discrete_bupaR,   raw_data = FALSE,   plotly = TRUE,   eventlog = deprecated(),   .abbreviate = deprecated() )

title: Dotted Chart — dotted_chart
text: dotted chart graph activity instance displayed point (dot). x-axis refers time aspect, y-axis refers cases.

title: Dotted Chart — dotted_chart
code: dotted_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative", "relative_week", "relative_day"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   add_end_events = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for eventlog dotted_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative", "relative_week", "relative_day"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   add_end_events = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for activitylog dotted_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative", "relative_week", "relative_day"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   add_end_events = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for grouped_eventlog dotted_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative", "relative_week", "relative_day"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   add_end_events = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for grouped_activitylog dotted_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative", "relative_week", "relative_day"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   add_end_events = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated() )

title: Dotted Chart — dotted_chart
text: log log: Object class log derivatives (grouped_log, eventlog, activitylog, etc.). x character (default "absolute"): Value plot x-axis: "absolute" time "relative" time (since start week: "relative_week", since start day: "relative_day"). sort character (default "auto"): Ordering cases y-axis: "auto" (default, see Details), "start", "end", "duration", "start_week", "start_day". color character (default NULL): Attribute use coloring activity instances (dots). attribute present log. Default (NULL) activity identifier (activity_id()). Use NA colors. units character (default "auto"): Time units use x-axis case relative time: "auto" (default, see Details), "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks". add_end_events logical (default FALSE): Whether add dots complete lifecycle event different shape. scale_color ggplot2 scale function (default scale_color_discrete_bupaR): Set color scale. Defaults scale_color_discrete_bupaR.  Replaced scale_color_discrete 26 activities present. plotly logical (default FALSE): Return plotly object, instead ggplot2. eventlog ; please use log instead.

title: Dotted Chart — dotted_chart
text: setting sort "auto", ordering cases done automatically, based specified value x: x = "absolute": sort = "start", x = "relative": sort = "duration", x = "relative_week": sort = "start_week", x = "relative_day": sort = "start_day". setting units "auto", time units x-axis done automatically, based specified value x: x = "absolute": units = "weeks", x = "relative": units = "weeks", x = "relative_week": units = "secs", x = "relative_day": units = "secs".

title: Dotted Chart — dotted_chart
text: dotted_chart(eventlog): Create dotted chart eventlog. dotted_chart(activitylog): Create dotted chart activitylog. dotted_chart(grouped_eventlog): Create dotted chart grouped_eventlog. dotted_chart(grouped_activitylog): Create dotted chart grouped_activitylog.

title: Dotted Chart — dotted_chart
code: library(processmapR) library(eventdataR)  patients %>%  dotted_chart(x = "absolute", sort = "start", color = "employee")

title: Frequency map profile — frequency

what: Configure layout parameters for process map — layout_pm
title: Configure layout parameters for process map — layout_pm
text: Configure layout parameters process map

title: Configure layout parameters for process map — layout_pm
code: layout_pm(fixed_positions = NULL, edge_weight = FALSE, edge_cutoff = 0)

title: Configure layout parameters for process map — layout_pm
text: fixed_positions specified data.frame three columns 'act', 'x', 'y' position nodes fixed. Note using option switches 'neato' layout engine. edge_weight TRUE frequency edge appears process map influence process map layout. Edges higher frequency get higher priority layout algorithm, increases visibility 'process highways'. Note effect using 'fixed_positions' parameters. edge_cutoff Edges appear process map frequency considered calculating layout. may create long complicated edge routings choosen high. Note effect using 'fixed_positions' parameters.

code: lined_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   line_width = 2,   plotly = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for eventlog lined_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   line_width = 2,   plotly = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for activitylog lined_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   line_width = 2,   plotly = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for grouped_eventlog lined_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   line_width = 2,   plotly = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )  # S3 method for grouped_activitylog lined_chart(   log,   x = c("absolute", "relative"),   sort = c("auto", "start", "end", "duration"),   color = NULL,   units = c("auto", "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks"),   line_width = 2,   plotly = FALSE,   scale_color = bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR,   eventlog = deprecated() )

title: Lined Chart — lined_chart
text: log log: Object class log derivatives (grouped_log, eventlog, activitylog, etc.). x character (default "absolute"): Value plot x-axis: "absolute" time "relative" time. sort character (default "auto"): Ordering cases y-axis: "auto" (default, see Details), "start", "end", "duration". color character (default NULL): Attribute use coloring activity instances (dots). attribute present log. Default (NULL) activity identifier (activity_id()). Use NA colors. units character (default "auto"): Time units use x-axis case relative time: "auto" (default, see Details), "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks". line_width numeric (default 2): width lines. plotly logical (default FALSE): Return plotly object, instead ggplot2. scale_color ggplot2 scale function (default scale_color_discrete_bupaR): Set color scale. Defaults scale_color_discrete_bupaR.  Replaced scale_color_discrete 26 activities present. eventlog ; please use log instead.

title: Lined Chart — lined_chart
text: setting sort "auto", ordering cases done automatically, based specified value x: x = "absolute": sort = "start", x = "relative": sort = "duration". setting units "auto", time units x-axis done automatically, based specified value x: x = "absolute": units = "weeks", x = "relative": units = "weeks".

title: Performance map profile — performance
text: Function create performance map profile used type process map. results process map describing process time.

title: Performance map profile — performance
code: performance(   FUN = mean,   units = c("mins", "secs", "hours", "days", "weeks", "months", "quarters", "semesters",     "years"),   flow_time = c("idle_time", "inter_start_time"),   color_scale = "Reds",   color_edges = "red4",   ... )

title: Performance map profile — performance
text: FUN summary function called process time specific activity, e.g. mean, median, min, max units time unit processing time presented (mins, hours, days, weeks, months, quarters, semesters, years. month defined 30 days. quarter 13 weeks. semester 26 weeks year 365 days flow_time time depict flows: inter start time time start timestamp consecutive activity instances, idle time time end start time consecutive activity instances. color_scale Name color scale used nodes. Defaults Reds. See Rcolorbrewer::brewer.pal.info() options. color_edges color used edges. Defaults red4. ... Additional arguments FUN

title: Precendence Matrix — precedence_matrix
text: Construct precendence matrix, showing activities followed . function deprecated replaced process_matrix function, shared usage process_map

title: Precendence Matrix — precedence_matrix
code: precedence_matrix(   eventlog,   type = c("absolute", "relative", "relative-antecedent", "relative-consequent",     "relative-case") )

title: Precendence Matrix — precedence_matrix
text: eventlog event log object used type type precedence matrix, can absolulte, relative, relative-antecedent relative-consequent. Absolute return matrix absolute frequencies, relative return global relative frequencies antecedent-consequent pairs. Relative-antecedent return relative frequencies within antecendent, .e. showing relative proportion consequents within antecedent. Relative-consequent reverse.

title: Precendence Matrix — precedence_matrix
code: if (FALSE) { library(eventdataR) data(patients) precedence_matrix(patients) }

title: Process Map — process_map
text: function creating process map event log.

title: Process Map — process_map
code: process_map(   log,   type = frequency("absolute"),   sec = NULL,   type_nodes = type,   type_edges = type,   sec_nodes = sec,   sec_edges = sec,   rankdir = "LR",   render = T,   fixed_edge_width = F,   layout = layout_pm(),   fixed_node_pos = NULL,   eventlog = deprecated(),   ... )  # S3 method for eventlog process_map(   log,   type = frequency("absolute"),   sec = NULL,   type_nodes = type,   type_edges = type,   sec_nodes = sec,   sec_edges = sec,   rankdir = "LR",   render = T,   fixed_edge_width = F,   layout = layout_pm(),   fixed_node_pos = NULL,   eventlog = deprecated(),   ... )  # S3 method for grouped_eventlog process_map(   log,   type = frequency("absolute"),   sec = NULL,   type_nodes = type,   type_edges = type,   sec_nodes = sec,   sec_edges = sec,   rankdir = "LR",   render = T,   fixed_edge_width = F,   layout = layout_pm(),   fixed_node_pos = NULL,   eventlog = deprecated(),   ... )  # S3 method for activitylog process_map(   log,   type = frequency("absolute"),   sec = NULL,   type_nodes = type,   type_edges = type,   sec_nodes = sec,   sec_edges = sec,   rankdir = "LR",   render = T,   fixed_edge_width = F,   layout = layout_pm(),   fixed_node_pos = NULL,   eventlog = deprecated(),   ... )

title: Process Map — process_map
text: log log: Object class log derivatives (grouped_log, eventlog, activitylog, etc.). type process map type, can created functions frequency, performance custom. first type focusses frequency aspect process, second one focussed processing time. third one allows custom attributes used. sec secondary process map type. Values shown brackets. type_nodes process map type used nodes , can created functions frequency performance. first type focusses frequency aspect process, second one focussed processing time. type_edges process map type used edges , can created functions frequency performance. first type focusses frequency aspect process, second one focussed processing time. sec_nodes secondary process map type nodes . sec_edges secondary process map type edges . rankdir direction layout graph:  "LR" (default),"TB", "BT", "RL", corresponding directed graphs drawn top bottom, left right, bottom top, right left, respectively. render Whether map rendered immediately (default), rather object type dgr_graph returned. fixed_edge_width TRUE, vary width edges. layout List parameters influencing (automatic) layout process map. Use layout_pm create suitable parameter list. fixed_node_pos Deprecated, please use 'layout' parameter instead. eventlog ; please use log instead. ... Deprecated arguments

text: process_map(eventlog): Process map event log process_map(grouped_eventlog): Process map event log process_map(activitylog): Process map activitylog

title: Render process map — render_map
text: map process_map created process_map argument render = F. layout string specifying layout type use node placement rendering. Possible layouts include: nicely, circle, tree, kk, fr. output string specifying output type; graph (default) renders graph using grViz() function visNetwork renders graph using visnetwork() function. as_svg option render graph SVG document. title optional title graph using output = "graph". width optional parameter specifying width resulting graphic pixels. height optional parameter specifying height resulting graphic pixels.

title: Trace Explorer — trace_explorer
text: Different activity sequences log can visualized trace_explorer(). type argument, can used explore frequent well infrequent traces. coverage argument specificies much log want explore. default set 0.2, meaning show ()frequency traces covering 20% log.

title: Trace Explorer — trace_explorer
code: trace_explorer(   log,   coverage = NULL,   n_traces = NULL,   type = c("frequent", "infrequent"),   coverage_labels = c("relative", "absolute", "cumulative"),   abbreviate = TRUE,   show_labels = TRUE,   label_size = 3,   scale_fill = bupaR::scale_fill_discrete_bupaR,   raw_data = FALSE,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated(),   .abbreviate = deprecated() )  # S3 method for eventlog trace_explorer(   log,   coverage = NULL,   n_traces = NULL,   type = c("frequent", "infrequent"),   coverage_labels = c("relative", "absolute", "cumulative"),   abbreviate = TRUE,   show_labels = TRUE,   label_size = 3,   scale_fill = bupaR::scale_fill_discrete_bupaR,   raw_data = FALSE,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated(),   .abbreviate = deprecated() )  # S3 method for activitylog trace_explorer(   log,   coverage = NULL,   n_traces = NULL,   type = c("frequent", "infrequent"),   coverage_labels = c("relative", "absolute", "cumulative"),   abbreviate = TRUE,   show_labels = TRUE,   label_size = 3,   scale_fill = bupaR::scale_fill_discrete_bupaR,   raw_data = FALSE,   plotly = FALSE,   eventlog = deprecated(),   .abbreviate = deprecated() )

title: Trace Explorer — trace_explorer
text: log log: Object class log derivatives (eventlog activitylog). coverage numeric (default 0.2): percentage coverage trace explore. Defaults 0.2 (0.05) ()frequent. n_traces integer: Instead setting coverage, exact number traces can set. integer larger 0. type character (default "frequent"): "frequent" traces first, "infrequent" traces first? coverage_labels character (default "relative"): Change labels shown right process variants. can "relative" frequency (default), "absolute", "cumulative". Multiple labels can selected time. abbreviate logical (default TRUE): TRUE, abbreviate activity labels. show_labels logical (default TRUE): FALSE, activity labels shown. label_size numeric (default 3): Font size labels. scale_fill ggplot2 scale function (default scale_fill_discrete_bupaR): Set color scale. Defaults scale_fill_discrete_bupaR. Replaced scale_fill_discrete 26 activities present. raw_data logical (default FALSE): Return raw data instead graph. plotly logical (default FALSE): Return plotly object, instead ggplot2. eventlog ; please use log instead. .abbreviate ; please use abbreviate instead.

title: Trace Explorer — trace_explorer
text: trace_explorer(eventlog): Trace explorer eventlog. trace_explorer(activitylog): Trace explorer activitylog.

title: Trace Explorer — trace_explorer
code: library(processmapR) library(eventdataR)  patients %>%  trace_explorer(coverage = 0.8) #> Warning: Ignoring unknown aesthetics: text

title: processmapR 0.5.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-03

title: processmapR 0.5.2
text: Functions render_map() export_map() added, using DiagrammeR functions longer needed. dotted_chart() lined_chart() now argument scale_color specify colour scale dots. Defaults bupaR::scale_color_discrete_bupaR. Reverts ggplot2::scale_color_discrete 26 activities present. trace_explorer() now argument scale_fill specify colour scale fill. Defaults bupaR::scale_fill_discrete_bupaR. Reverts ggplot2::scale_fill_discrete 26 activities present. dotted_chart(), lined_chart(), trace_explorer() now plotly argument specify plotly object returned, instead ggplot object.

title: processmapR 0.5.2
text: Fixed bug using process_map() grouped_log. Added required dependencies rsvg DiagrammeRsvg export_map function.

title: processmapR 0.5.2
text: idotted_chart(), iplotly_dotted_chart(), ilined_chart(), iplotly_lined_chart() deprecated. Argument .abbreviate trace_explorer() deprecated favour abbreviate. plotly_dotted_chart(), plotly_lined_chart(), plotly_trace_explorer() deprecated favour plotly_dotted_chart(..., plotly = TRUE), plotly_lined_chart(..., plotly = TRUE), plotly_trace_explorer(..., plotly = TRUE), respectively.

title: processmapR 0.5.2
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Color scales moved bupaR (0.5.1). Updated documentation dotted_chart(), lined_chart(), trace_explorer().
